p: Inspection of feature importance for model derived on 6538P biofilm percentage production and EOsâ€™ chemical compositions revealed 3-octanol, d-limonene and pulegone as the chemical components more associated to bacterial biofilm production ( Figure 7 and Table 8). Further investigation of their partial dependence plots ( Supplementary Material Figure SM-2) indicated those three chemicals as all positively correlated with biofilm enhancement.
